name: THE LAUNCH (Jayden)
description:
This is a piece of interactive fiction I created in Inkle for #InkJam20! It was my first time both using Inkle and participating in a game jam. Heck, it's my first time making a game at all.

Feedback is very welcome (feel free to reach out at @JaydenPerry_ on Twitter), I put this together on the last night of the jam having scrapped a previous idea I no longer liked. I hope you enjoy!
